entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers late this evening and after midnight. Clearing before morning. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 overnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 11 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 6.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the morning. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near noon. High 6. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 11 April 2023
